content: Hi, I'm having issues with my order (Order #1234). It didn't arrive on time.
Sorry to hear that! Can you please provide me with your tracking number so I can look into this further?
I think it was shipped out last week, but I never got the confirmation email. Is there a way to track it down?

I apologize for not sending you that email. We did send out an email with tracking information earlier in your order history (Order #1234). Can you please check your inbox and let me know if you see it?
Okay, I think I saw the email now. But what about my other order, Order #5678? It was supposed to be delivered last week too.

I apologize for the delay in your orders. However, I couldn't find any information on a previous order with that number (Order #5678). Can you please provide me with more details about that order, such as the date of purchase or any confirmation numbers?

I'm pretty sure I ordered it online from your website. The report showed that it was shipped out on time, but I never got my package. Can you help me get a replacement? And what's going on with the report - can you send me that too?
